title: VSCO Launches AI Text-Prompt Tool for Easy Photo Edits
description: VSCO has launched a prompt-based AI image editing feature, enabling users to transform photos with simple text like "make this warmer" or "add vintage effects." This innovation streamlines mobile workflows amid growing AI adoption in photography, though it sparks debate over authenticity and artistic purity among purists.
